verses.name: Acts 7:39
verses.text: To whom our fathers would not obey, but thrust him from them, and in their hearts turned back again into Egypt,

verses.name: Acts 7:40
verses.text: Saying unto Aaron, Make us gods to go before us: for as for this Moses, which brought us out of the land of Egypt, we wot not what is become of him.

verses.name: Acts 7:41
verses.text: And they made a calf in those days, and offered sacrifice unto the idol, and rejoiced in the works of their own hands.
